description: The Retina 5K, 27-inch iMac features the following software applications installed on the machine: Adobe Creative Cloud applications (Premiere, Photoshop, Illustrator, Audition, After Effects, etc.), Logic Pro X, MainStage, GarageBand, Audacity, Final Cut Pro, iMovie, Camtasia, and more.
The 32″ full-HD VicTek monitor has a 20,000:1 dynamic contrast ratio for deeper blacks and brighter whites and 60Hz refresh rate for continually bright images.

The Scarlett 18i20 is a high-quality, 18-in, 20-out USB audio interface with eight 3rd Generation mic preamps, Air mode, talkback mic, loopback and more. It comes with Ableton Live Lite, Pro Tools Artist and Hitmaker Expansion plugins for music production.
KRK's Rokit 5 G3 (Generation 3) powered studio monitors offer professional performance and accuracy for recording, mixing, mastering and playback.

The dbx 266xs 2-channel Compressor/Gate features dynamics control for any program material, program-adaptive expander/gates, LEDs for gain reduction, compression and gate threshold, and stereo or dual-mono operation.
MPK mini is an ultra-compact keyboard for singer-songwriters, beat makers, and electronic musicians to create music.
The Anker 10 Port 60W Data Hub offers seven ports for high-speed data transfer of up to 5Gbps and three ports that charge of up to 2.1 amps.

Tascam 202MKVII Double Cassette Recorder Deck features a dual twin-head decks can each be used for recording or playback (or can be used together), parallel recording function records audio to both decks simultaneously, and a microphone input that can be mixed with cassette 1 audio and recorded real time to cassette 2 for karaoke or voice over applications.
The Pioneer Auto Reverse Direct Drive RT-707 Recorder features a low profile rack mount design with 7" reels and auto reverse playback.
The Hafler P4000 is a three rack height, two channel professional power amplifier for studio monitoring, touring sound and fixed installations.

The HDMI to USB3.0 Video Capture Dongle can capture one single channel HD HDMI video signals from sources such as Blu-Ray Player, Play Station, audio/video receiver, satellite receivers, SLR cameras with HDMI output. The input and output video signal can reach 1080p/60hz.
The Countryman B3 Omnidirectional Lavalier Microphone is water resistant, makeup resistant, has low handling noise, and can handle high sound levels up to 150dB SPL.
The SM57 features a uniform cardioid pick-up pattern that isolates the main sound source and minimizes background noise.

The Shure SM58 Dynamic Vocal Microphone utilizes a highly effective, built-in, spherical filter that minimizes wind and breath pop noise while the cardioid pickup pattern isolates the main sound source and minimizes unwanted background noise.
The Rode NT1A diaphragm 1" cardioid condenser microphone features low noise and delivers warmth and extended dynamic range. A studio grade pop shield, shock mount, and dust cover are included.
The Marshall PF-002 pop filter helps improve the sound quality of the recorded voice by reducing popping sounds during recordings.
The On-Stage DS300B Posi-Lok 7" Mini Desktop Microphone Boom Stand provides stability, vibration dampening, and a wide range of angle positions.
The On-Stage MS7700B Tripod Microphone Stand features steel-reinforced plastic leg housing offers less weight and more strength and adjustable height from 32" to 61.5".
The AKG K240 MKII professional over-ear, semi-open headphones advanced 30 mm XXL transducers with Varimotion diaphragms deliver a wide dynamic range, increased sensitivity, and high sound levels.
The LG 1080p up-scaling HDMI™ Player with progressive scan includes a multi-region DVD player, a DVD recorder, a multi-region VHS player for playback and recording.
The green screen kit includes one backdrop stand, one green, and one black backdrop. The kit can be used for photography backdrop and Chroma Key.
The Neewer TT560 Flash Speedlite Kit includes Neewer TT560 Speedlite Flash, 71"/180cm Light Stands, and 32"/ 80cm 5 in 1 reflector disc.

description: The Canon VIXIA HF G20 HD Camcorder comes with 32GB Internal Flash Memory and 10x HD Video lens (5mm equivalent: 30.4mm – 304mm) with 8-Blade Iris and 3.5 inch touch LCD.
The Canon VIXIA HF G20 HD Camcorder comes with 32GB Internal Flash Memory and 10x HD Video lens (5mm equivalent: 30.4mm – 304mm) with 8-Blade Iris and 3.5 inch touch LCD.

With built-in Wi-Fi and Bluetooth, and user-friendly modes like QuikCapture, SuperView and Auto Low Light, GoPro HERO+LCD provides video recording at 1080p at 60 fps/and 8 megapixel photos. The kit comes with a clip mount and a suction cup mount.

description: The lightweight Amazon Basics tripod can support most cameras up to 6.6 pounds. The tripod’s lockable legs can extend from 20 to 48 inches and include a center post that can be cranked up for a total height of 60 inches.

The Tascam Portable Studio Recorder DR-05 features a pair of condenser microphones that handle up to 125dB SPL and records in MP3 or WAV format – including 96kHz/24-bit high-resolution audio – to microSD or microSDHC media. The kit includes a SM57 microphone.
The Seagate Portable Drive is a USB external hard drive features 1TB storage space and works with Windows or Mac computers.

description: Adapters, cables, chargers, and other accessories.
The UBeesize Phone Tripod Stand & Selfie Stick Tripod features a maximum height to 67 inches with a minimum storage space to 20 inches.

description: The Canon DSLR Camera Kit includes a Canon EOS 4000d digital camera, a Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II Lens, a Canon Neck Strap, a battery, a charger, a 32GB memory card, a memory card reader, and a small tripod.
The Logitech USB Headset H390 with Noise Cancelling Microphone features padded headband and ear pads, rotating, noise canceling microphone, inline volume and mute controls with USB connections.

description: The Sensyne 10-inch Selfie Ring Light with 51-inch Tripod Stand features three colors lighting modes with 10 brightness levels adjustable from 0% to 100% and a multi-functional adjustable travel tripod that can be extended from 16" to 51". The kit includes a ring light, a wireless remote shutter, a phone holder, and AC/DC adapter.
Logitech Brio supports ultra 4K HD video collaboration and features high dynamic range technology that automatically adjust to any lighting environment.

The Blue Yeti USB Microphone features four different pattern modes to record audio for podcasting, Twitch streaming, music recording, voice overs, acoustic guitar, choir, band's live performance, a multi-person podcast, a conference call, duet or a two-person interview. The kit includes a USB microphone, a USB cable, and a quick start guide.
The Zoom H4n Pro 4-Track Portable Recorder features advanced X/Y microphones, natural-sounding preamps, and a 4-Channel Mode that records with the built-in microphones and two external inputs.

The Logitech Wireless Presenter R400 allows you to advance or go back through your slides at the touch of a control key while moving around the room and engage your audience with reliable wireless range of up to 50 feet.
The Logitech Z50 portable speaker features a 10 Watts Peak/5 Watts RMS power from the 2.25 inch driver design that can amplify your device's audio in any room.

The Wacom Intuos Pro Paper features a creative pen with tilt-recognition and virtually lag–free tracking for artists and designers to capture editable versions of their paper sketches. The kit includes a tablet, a pen, a pen stand, a paper clip, four pen color rings, a USB cable, and a quick start guide.

The Zoom F1 Field Recorder + Lavalier Mic include a two-channel audio recorder, a 1.25” monochrome LCD display, and supports up to 24-bit/96 kHz audio in BWF-compliant WAV or a variety of MP3 formats.
The Logitech Stereo H151 On-Ear Headphones

description: The PodMic is a broadcast-quality dynamic microphone optimized for incredible performance in podcasting, livestreaming, and other speech or vocal applications.

The RØDECaster Pro II is the ultimate audio production solution for content creators, including streamers, podcasters and musicians. Combining revolutionary features with superior sound quality, endless customisability and unmatched ease of use, the RØDECaster Pro II is all you will ever need to record incredible audio for your content.
The RØDE NTH-100 professional over-ear headphones offer exceptional sonic performance and superior comfort that inspires creativity.

The Rockville RVMIC1 v2 Pro Audio Tripod Microphone Stand is a step up from its predecessor, designed with both the seasoned musician and the passionate beginner in mind. The adjustable height ranges from 36 inches to 63 inches.
